Men think they are representing the justice of God, but they do not represent his tenderness and the great love wherewith he has loved us. 


                     - 21 - 

Their human invention, originating with the specious devices of Satan, appears fair enough to the blinded eyes of men, because it is inherent in their nature. A lie, believed, practised, becomes a truth to them. Thus the purpose of the satanic agencies is accomplished, that men should reach these conclusions through the working of their own inventive minds.
